title: Need type help!
content:
I’ve created a custom font with TypeTool II for a book I’m working on. It has worked fine up until now, but the book is going into foreign translation and my special characters are screwed up (encoding issues). I don’t have the time to figure this out, so I’m looking for someone who knows the program that I can pay to fix this.

To contact me:  
toddb at beckermayer dot com

 [‹ Free FontFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121013618/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13861 "Go to previous forum topic") [Futura Condensed Alternative? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121013618/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12451 "Go to next forum topic")
author: toddb
